name: PROJECT PC
description:
Project PC Is An Android Game Developed By Kangaroo Network And Colour World

The Game Is A Top Down Adventure Where Players Play In A Computer Environment Where They Choose Their Own Play Style

One Can Play As A Virus Or An Antivirus.

A Lot Of Randomization Is Used In The Game Thus Experience May Differ. Feedback To More Features Players Would Want To See In The Game Would Be Greatly Appreciated.

In case Of Incompatibility Issues Contact us 

In case Of Lag Or Poor Performance Tone Down The Graphics
